function_description: Creating a new list on the board
initial_state: The user is on a board page with at least one existing list displayed.
steps: Locate and click on the '+add list' button on the board.
Enter a name for the new list in the provided input field.
Click on the green 'Add List' button to confirm the creation of the list.
expected_state: A new list with the specified name is added to the board. A pop-up window opens, prompting the user to create another list, which can be closed by clicking 'Cancel' or performing another action.
